overview: Brian D. Annese is a Partner and Vice President, Finance and Administration at Commonwealth Capital Ventures. He is responsible for managing the firmâ€™s financial, legal, operational, investor reporting, and administrative functions. He has been working with entrepreneurs and early stage companies for over twenty years. Prior to joining Commonwealth, Brian spent more than 10 years in Commercial Banking, primarily at Fleet Bank, working with early stage and small businesses. Earlier he was a Senior Auditor at Deloitte and Touche where he worked with early stage and Fortune 500 companies.

degrees.institution: Babson College Graduate School of Management
